CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers relative to the peak of Ethical Consumers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Tech-savvy Consumers is to the {left} of the peak of Ethical Consumers.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Health-Conscious show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Health-Conscious shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Convenience-Oriented reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Convenience-Oriented} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =83.2?
EVJ.A: At X =83.2,the label with the highest density is {Ethical Consumers}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 44? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Organic Shoppers}'s peak at {82},{Premium Brands}'s peak at {81},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {59},{Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {80}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 60? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Health-Conscious}'s peak at {9},{Tech-savvy Consumers}'s peak at {9},{Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {14},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {59}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Premium Brands or Health-Conscious?
NC.A: {Premium Brands} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Budget Shoppers?
NC.A: {Budget Shoppers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {4} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Convenience-Oriented}
